line_1: Silent with upturn'd eyes unbreathing crowds
line_2: Pursue the floating wonder to the clouds;

line_1: — Slow out of earth, before the festive crowds,
line_2: On wheels of fire, amid a night of clouds,

line_1: — So when the Plague o'er London's gasping crowds
line_2: Shook her dank wing, and steer'd her murky clouds;

line_1: Enraptur'd Sylphs arose in murmuring crowds
line_2: To air-wove canopies and pillowy clouds;
NOT wrapt in smoky London's sulphurous clouds,

line_1: By me pass the ghastly crowds,
